content.detailedDescription: It started this summer, haven't notice it before and i lived here 7 yrs. not sure if it's man made or a planet. my mother notice it as well, and a friend and we were all wondering. it's very bright, looks like a diamond shape and points come out from it, its really blinding if you really look at it. if it's a star, it's really big! also it moves, left to right. it starts out up the street from me and then moves to the center then to the end of street, then makes a left up another street. it's there most of the time, some times its not. it's still going on. sometimes it's gone for a week and then shows back up and stays around for a week, sometimes longer. also it's white and shines off blue in the center of it. i see it when i take my dogs out, and the nights my mother picks me up. i thought it was the space station, but when i heard on the news you could only see it on their day mentioned, i was like, well guess it's not what i'm seeing. because i'm seeing it all week,lol. hopefully it's a planet.
content.summary: Very bright, starts from left to right

content.detailedDescription: I was outside surveying for ufos watching the night sky for  over an hour,when i witnessed a small object oval in shape,possibly disc shape with oval appearance.It was moving very fast i measured by gauging my thumbs close to 6 inches apart in view moving to stay insync with object to get idea of the distance to speed,and i know from a pilot friend that 3 inches on the ground can be over a mile in relation when you try to configureearth to sky sprrd ratios. the fact of the matter is 6 inches could under conditions range to over 2 miles yhis object was traveling atleast 6 inches in my scale per second thats moving!!!!!!!  it was directly overhead at 12oclock above me,and it started out to appear yellow white to dim yellow to red as it looked to cool off,or powerdown its appearence? its trajectory was east to west in a degree of aprox southeast, to west, and it changed course:  sort of curved as it changed direction.  i witnessed it  turning dark before i lost sight it looked as if it mayhave been picking up speed no tail,nor did it flameout or look like any metior or metiorite i have seen,matter of fact i would state that its changing speed and direction cancels that hypothisis.I have witnessed many ufo incidents,and i dont understand it all however i am researching values and conclude intelligence behind the sightings, not a blind or uncreatured  flight without some sort of guidence involved......
content.summary: Extremely fast object whizzing thru sky changing colors and disapearing

content.detailedDescription: I was letting dogs out and looking up at the sky as usual.  i have been a mufon member and always look up when i go out.  after seeing several of the usual commercial jets that are almost constantly passing over from east to west (occasionally west to east at a different altitude), i noticed, while looking approximately north in the direction of the big dipper a flash of light about the size and brightness of the brightest stars.  the flash occurred about every 5 seconds and took about 1 second to fade in and out.  i could not see any other lights on the object like i can with the commercial jets.  the object moved approximately from the handle of the big dipper where i first saw it towards the southeast.  the flashing became irregular as it approached the usual flight path for commercial jets.  i saw it flash once just before intersecting this usual path (it would have come very close to one of these passing jets if it continued along the same path that i last observed it following.  at first i thought it was just another airplane because of it's apparent altitude and speed which i would estimate was the same as other aircraft i have observed.  it moved at a constant speed in the same direction during the entire observation.  i was quite calm while observing and tried to gather as much information as i could as this did not appear like other aircraft that i have observed.  this is the second attempt to submit this observation.  during the first, as i was about to submit, my computer suddenly and unexpectedly decided to shut down. i don't remember this happening before in this way.  please contact me if you need additional info.
content.summary: White starlike aircraft flashing approximately every 5 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
it all started when i got my new phone, almost a year ago. i was taking pictures of clouds, and in one of them, there was a random white orb in the cloud. i didnt think anything of it at first, i just thought it looked cool, so i kept the picture. then, one afternoon sometime in september 2010, i was laying down on my trampoline looking at the sky. a white orb was gliding, and zig-zagging across the sky. it came out of one cloud, and glided into the next one. i was rather curious, so i stayed outside and waited to see it again. when my mom came outside, i told her what i had seen, and i showed her the picture i took a when i first got my phone. she was stunned. she said for me to be careful. 
 a week ago, we were having our fall break from school, every day of the break, i noticed an odd white light outside my window, in the sky. i just ignored it. then last night at 3:30am i woke up in the middle of the night and saw the light outside my window. i waited until it disappeared, and  then i tried to go back to sleep. out of no where, i hear this loud noise, that sounded like a car revving up to 100mph, i thought it was coming from the road, but it sounded too loud to be. then it started making a warping noise. it was steady for about 15 seconds then it warped for another 15 seconds, like vrooooooooommmm, voom, voom, voom, voom, voom. it was one of the craziest things to ever happen to me. i was completely still, and tried not to make a noise, up until 4:00 then i ran to my moms room and told her what i heard. im almost afraid to sleep now.
content.summary: A white sphere

content.detailedDescription: Hi to see what i experienced please view the following video *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg).
content.summary: Video recorded ufo in nyc on october 10,2010

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch with my girlfriend talking, i looked up at jupiter while we were talking.  i turned to her while talking and when i looked back up at jupiter we both saw two lights in the sky next to the planet.  they looked like they were about the height that jets usually fly.  they were close to eachother, one about an inch(and inch meaning from my perspective on the ground) above the other.  the top light slowly moved up and dissapeared, and the second shortly followed it.  they both were there for maybe a minute then gone.  they appeared out of nowhere.
content.summary: Two bright lights looking like jupiter (not blinking) slowly moving away dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Our newborn daughter woke us up at approximately 2 am.  i got out of bed to listen to her for a while wondering if i needed to intervene and go into her bedroom to comfort her.

while i was waiting i went out onto the back porch of our 2nd story apartment (in a two flat building) as i often do when i can't sleep, it was about 2:20 or so at this point.  we live in san francisco where it is very hilly.  i looked over the hill that borders our neighborhood to the southwest and i noticed 3 bright red lights (similar to led lights) with a third blue light moving in a very strange way around the sky above the hill.  i am a professional pilot and i know how conventional aircraft move through the sky.  this was nothing like that and i knew it immediately.  the three red lights were (from my perspective) in a triangle formation and were equidistant from each other and moving in unison.  the third light was blue.  it remained close to the red group (so close as to be considered all part of the same formation) only it seemed to move independently of the red lights.  

the movement of the whole group was more similar to an insect than any aircraft i've ever seen.  it moved at random around the southwest sky for about 30 seconds.  if i had to estimate the distance, i would say at least two miles and possibly much more depending on the actual size of the lights.  from my perspective they were no bigger than pen lights but were very bright in that led sort of way.

after about 30 seconds they descended behind the hill and i could no longer see them.

during the time they were visible i called to my wife through the window to open the shades and look out but she did not wake.  i am, therefore, the only witness i know of.  

i am wondering if anybody else in the area reported the sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A cluster of lights - 3 red in the shape of a triangle with a third blue light moving around san francisco southern sky

content.detailedDescription:
Bright light, not white, could not make out the shape, but was a large object. 

no faa lights, only red and white strobing lights. moved slowly, clear sky, stars very visible. 

bene ha elohim.
content.summary: Bright, strobing red and white lights, large ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I am a truck driver, i was driving home from carlin nv to salt lake city and stopped at the rest stop just east of wendover, utah, at about 5:00 am, i always look at the stars when i stop just out of habit i saw a star that i had not seen before low in the southern sky, i whatched it and it started to move so i looked closer i watched for awhile it looked like it was trying to maintain it's position kind like wobbling! then i asked it to give me a sighn that it could hear me, it blinked off then on real bright then back to were it was originally, it moved up and down and side to side then the clouds rolled in and i lost sight of it around 5:30 i have friends that say they saw one that morning about 2:00 am flashing red,blue and green and white lights they watched it for awhile as well it was moving upand down. it was high in the southern sky, we think that it is the same one that we saw last night that looked like a planet.
that night on 10-8-10 and 10-9-10 i drove up into the nearby mountains to get out of the clouds and lights of the city, i saw three of them in the northern sky far apart from one another, i whatched them as they moved around and blinked red, blue white and green lights, it was about 1:00-2:00 am i was listening to ian pundant on coast to coast am, i whatched them for about an hour and got tired and went home.
the following night 10-10-10 i saw one over salt lake it was disquising it's self as a planet just like the one i saw friday morning, then saw four more in the northern sky, i called my friend that said she and another friend saw one friday morning, she and i went up to a place called little mountain just east of salt lake at the top of emigration canyon, a popular place for star gazers, we were amazed there must have been at least thirty to fouty of these things in all areas of the the sky they were all moving like they were trying to maintain there position, then ocasionally they would shoot off to another position.
the one that was the most amazing was the one right above us that was just one white light, it was the one that looked like a planet, it was the closest to us, we looked at it with binoculars and could see windows on either side of it, oval in shape it was setting off center on a 45 degree angle it would move when we asked it to and it would change it's light intensity from time to time.
we got tired and went home about 2:00 am i am suprised that not one thing was said on the news or radio, i think that they choose who they want to be revealed to, we were not scared in any way it was a feeling of kindness, i am writing to you not out of concern but out of curiosity i know you take this stuff seriously and am not going to criticise us as the media may do. i would like to have someone with the right equiptment and know how to look at this in a non judgmental way, if i had more powerful binoculars of a high intensity camera i could have seen alot more detail.
content.summary: It was just i light from were i was, but it moved up and down and side to side.

content.detailedDescription: On 10/9/2010 approx. 21:15 my brother-inlaw, 12 year old son, my sister, and i were viewing jupiter with my telescope. my sister was looking at the time in the telescope, i was looking around to see what else we could look at. i noticed a bright star and stated that i dont remeber that star we should look at that. the star was brighter than jupiter. my son and brother in-law turned to look, at that time the star started to slowly get smaller until it was gone. by the time my sister looked it was already gone. we could still see all the other stars close to the area and knew it could'nt be the very light cloud cover that was moving in. the star never came back. this all took place within 1min and 30 seconds from the time i spotted it till the time it was gone. it did not move across the sky it seemed to be traveling outward. this is strange, something i've never seen before and can't explain it.
content.summary: Seen a star that diminished

content.detailedDescription: I was looking northeast for comet hartley 2 when a object just appeared from the same direction i was looking at i saw a triangle object that seemed like it was cloaking and moving soundless and fast enough to be in sight for about 3 to 4 seconds (real fast). my girlfriend was on the porch when she witnessed it for the remaining 1 to 2 sec she said it look like a group of giant bird or planelike objects flying in perfect formation but they're flying too fast. the objects had no lights but appeared to be glowing real dim like it was trying to camouflage in with the sky. it also had not any sound at all and was flying as high in the sky as a bird would.  it was real large bout the size of a commercial airplane flying extremely low.         . this happened approximately 8:58 to 9:00pm est (10-10-10) and was only in sight about 3 or 4 secs. this was the weirdest thing i seen before.
content.summary: Dim flying triangle appeared to be cloak like flyin  real fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my school area at the back of the school when i saw 6 black right angle shaped figures(3 dimensional) in the sky 3 on top of three they had one white light on each corner then 2 jets where going towards the triangels and they shot up into the air, the jets went up as if to follw them.  it happend fast.  i am not sure what made me notice them, i guess it was just there. i told my mother but she said it was probably the airshow doing some last minute practices.  however, she just realized that the airshow is not until oct. 16 & 17 of this year (2010).  i have tried looking on the internet to see if i find similar objects.My friend *(name deleted--cms/sg) was there with me but he had his back to it.  i asked him if he had seen it and he said no. 
**(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Saw 6 black right angle shaped figures in the sky 3 on top of three they had one white light on each corner then 2 jets where going towards the triangels and they shot up into the air, the jets went up as if to follw them.  it happend fast

content.detailedDescription: I had just drove into my driveway at 8:30 pm and noticed an orange glowing object over my neighbors house. i parked the car and got out to look at this better. it was large,pulsating,oval shape and very bright orage. it began to move and went over my house and the house behind me, i watched this object until it went completely out of site. this object made no sound whatsoever. it was not flying very high. as it went over my house it started picking up speed. it came in from the south and headed north until i could not see it anymore. i had called my son who was in the house to come out and see this, but when he got out, which was a few seconds this bright orange pulsating moving object was gone. this was not an airplane. i live close to an airport here and i see planes all the time. let me tell you this object was no way a plane. i sure wish i could find out what this was.
content.summary: Large orange object

content.detailedDescription: Walking on the beach with my son when we looked up at a plane that was flying overhead. i noticed way above the plane about 20 glimmering( it was actually strange, kind of like they were wavering/fluttering) spheres in a "v" formation. at first thought they were geese heading south for the winter but then realized they were way to high for that. as i was watching i noticed that they also stayed in place without moving. i thought this was strange so i kept watching. after about 10 seconds they suddenly went from a " v" formation to a circle and started moving slowly south. they then changed from a circle to a straight line while still moving south. after about 10-15 seconds in a straight line they simply vanished.
content.summary: Approx 20 silver spheres

content.detailedDescription: at 7pm eastern standard time,october 10,2010. i was finishing up some yard work and happened to look up and notice a large glowing sphere that was traveling from the south/west heading north/east. it was at a fairly high altitude and moving slowly at about satelite speed in a strait line. gaged by an aircraft that in the vacinity of the object and also at fairly high altitude the object was considerably larger than plane. it's color was glowing as if flame was inside,orange/red. of course, i was unable to find the camera and no pics are available. object was not any conventional aircraft,blimp or afterburner type effect. could you please notify me if there were any other sightings of this object last night or of any possible explanations.  thank you for your time, *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Large glowing sphere,

content.detailedDescription:
At 7:55 pm in the evening on 9/sept/2009 i was coming home from grocery shopping.  as i turned to get the groceries out of my car, i noticed a light out of the corner of my eye.  at first i thought it was a helicopter flashing a search light down towards the ground, but noticed it was completely stationary and silent.  it was in a slightly cloudy area and there was light beaming down from it, spreading out in a triangular fashion.  i felt afraid for a moment and took a few steps back, thinking i might be abducted by e.T.S, but then thought it is far away and motionless and that i was safe and should take the opportunity to observe it.  after a time (30 seconds, a minute?) of being motionless, it disappeared without a trace.

below are my notes written on september 25th, when the event was fresher in my mind

thanks mufon, for doing this important research work!

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
====================================================================

what i saw

on saturday, september 19th, 2009, at about 7:55 pm eastern time, i pulled my car into my driveway in asbury park, nj.  i opened my car door, got out of the car, and turned around 180 degrees as i headed for the trunk of the car.  as i looked up to the sky in the sse direction, i saw a distinct light.  in the first half second, i tried to mentally process whether it was a star, an airplane, or a part of the moon peaking from behind a cloud, but realized in was not anything i had seen in the sky before.  the light was an elliptical shaped object, and beneath it was an illuminated area.  the object had about the same luminous intensity as the moon and was a soft white, maybe with a slight peach tint.  the shape of the illuminated area resembled the shape mades by a directional lamp, pointing downward, against a wall, a somewhat parabolic shape.

i simultaneously felt apprehension and curiosity.  i took a step back, but then starting walking towards the light.  considering how is moved in relation to nearby objects as i moved, it was at minimum a half a mile away, but could have been light years away too.  the object seemed to be completely stationery.

in a fraction of a second, the light faded into nothingness.  i had seen the light for five seconds, maybe ten.  the sky had just a few scattered clouds.  the area where the light had been was cloudless, however, there was a mist where the illuminated area had been.  the mist was not as thick as the clouds and was much smaller than them, from my vantage point.  

also, in the same sector of the sky was an airplane.  not sure if its size or if it was closer to or further from me than the object.  it had both a flashing red and white light, but no idea if it was commercial or miliary.  from my vantage point, the elliptical object was probably similar in size as the airplane.   i wondered if they had gotten a better view of what i had just seen.  

i looked around the neighborhood, hoping to find another witness.  about 200 feet away, i found a young man, who said he had not seen it and obviously had his mind on something else and had been looking up in the sky.

i went inside, think about those few seconds of my life and what i could have possibly seen.  the time on my kitchen microwave was 7:58 pm.

(written sept 25th, 2009)
content.summary: Elliptical light seen motionless in the sky.  suddenly disappears.

content.detailedDescription: At 10p.M g.M.T. i opened the back door of my house and stepped into the garden for fresh air. i happened to glance up at the sky and observed there was cumulus cloud visible as well as a clear starry sky bethween the clouds. i noticed what i first thought was a satelite or space station travelling in an east to west direction. it was circular in shape like a round ball and was roughly the size of a  planet and it was hidden by cloud. suddenly from behind the clouds a delta winged aircraft appeared. i know it was delta winged because i study different aircraft as a hobby and subscribe to aviation magazines regularly. it appeared to be at a great height and could possibly be at space station height. it was golden or yellow coloured and there were no lights visible and nor was there any sound whatsoever. it stopped briefly in the sky and i was looking directly up at it. it then spun around quickly in a counter clockwise direction a full three hundred and sixty degrees and then immediatelty spun in a clockwise direction. it then flew away at great speed the way it had come and dissapeared  behind a  clouds. it appeared to bounce in the sky. it was the strangneness of the movement that i found most amazing and i dont know of any aircraft or aeroplane manufactured in this world that could move like this. it lasted approximately forty-five seconds. as i didnt have a video camera or anything else with me i have no visual evidence unfortunately. i found the whole experience amazing and i feel it is hugely important to report this. what i found most amazing was the movement of the craft. my most immediate reaction was to tell the person i share a house with of my experience and i have also told some work colleagues and family members.
content.summary: A disc similar to the space station appeared and travelled in an east to west direction initialy. it dissapeared behind a cloud and then a delta winged aircraft appeared  from behind the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Report called in to missouri mufon state director debbie ziegelmeyer.
full details will be attached with her report.
content.summary: 2 lights near jupiter which rotated and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my fiance nnerika were night fishing at this place called stone mountain park now, from where we were standing (at the bell) right across from the paddle boats area you can see this restricted area that's across the lake. its called the golf lake and over there you cannot fish,
and from behind the trees in that area, these little illuminated air crafts were rising up from behind the trees and like, they'd reach a certain height in the sky, the take off on a course to the left now... this happened about 16 times repeated and we saw this last night too we were just paying more attention to them tonight these airships had a little blue light on the left, a red light on the right, a white light in the middle, and two search lights on the bottom so, more started taking off from that same area beyond those trees...But they started taking different courses so, i called my mom and started talking extra super loud so, my fiance is thinking "if they aren't of this world, they can hear us" so, she was trying to get me to be quiet then... on of the air crafts comes in our direction and turns on these search lights so, my fiance turned off our flash lights and duck close to the ground but i panicked and took off running so, the airship starts following me so, the ship is following me, then i stopped and turned around to come back and get my fiance so i end up going where im covered by the trees and... i think the ship lost sight of me and.... it disappeared...Just vanished in thin air...Im even freaking out just typing this story up now.....So here we are going to my house and we look to the right of us and there was one of the air crafts...Up close!!!!! and i looked up int the air just after looking down just for a few seconds to drive properly and it was gone!!!!! that fast!!! and i didn't hear anything and neither did my fiance !! it was triangular and seemed to be flying sideways!!So i hurried home and now im seeing these same things in my front yard up in the sky and they were flying do high so you couldn't see them well and now im scared every night and now to go to sleep....I never want t go back to stone mountain again but if i do i want to expose these things....That is all
content.summary: Multiple ufos flying and when we left stone mountain park we were followed.

content.detailedDescription: To make a really long story short i have reason to believe that i was abducted between the hours of 3:00-5:30pm near the location of rib lake wisconsin while i was  driving. after i got back to my hotel i noticed a burn on my right hand that hadn't been there previously, i was also very dehyrated.  then i went in the jacuzzi and after i got back to my room i was going to get dressed and grabbed the sweatshirt i was wearing that day and noticed it had blood on it (5 marks) on the left side so i decided to inspect my body for any wounds since i have been abducted  before.  i found 5 marks like  pinpricks on my left hip.  they were in a row.  it was a about an inch or so long, maybe longer.   i drove home from wausau wisconsin on tuesday.  then on wednesday september 29th, 2010, after i took a shower i noticed 4 pinprick type shapes on my right hip, these were also in a row and redder, this was also about an inch to an inch and a half long.
content.summary: This is the continuation of my earlier abduction report

content.detailedDescription: On september 11, 2010 at aproximately 11 am my wife and i were driving home from the hardware store heady southward on amirault st in dieppe when we noticed a tiny star like light far away in the sky to the south. within a few seconds it became very bright and much larger, about 1/4 to 3/8 inch in diameter. the object looked to be over nova scotia. it didn't appear to be moving at all then the object started to dim and appeared to be turning on the spot as we could see a shadow on the right side which made it appear to be long or cigar shaped it dimmed completely and turned into a tiny black dot and moved away what seemed like an inch , but from the distance we observed it ,that would be quite a distance. and moved very quickly
content.summary: Star like light which grew brighter and larger.

content.detailedDescription:
10/10/2010 8:16 pm, over an hour after dark, official sunset was 6:35 pm, completely clear skies, cool evening, mid-50���s.

spotted several satellites and aircraft throughout the evening plus one meteorite so had accurate comparison of speed, altitude, luminosity to other objects.

8:16 pm spotted an object on a nearly perfectly north to south heading, passed directly overhead, appeared to be either in orbit or at least 100,000 feet msl, much faster than previously sighted satellites or aircraft, on a direct heading with no deviation or erratic movements.  similar in appearance to previously observed satellites with star-like appearance lacking any navigation or anti-collision lights that would appear on aircraft, but the luminosity of the observed object pulsed at approximately 4 or 6 second intervals during which time it burned/shone brightly for approximately two seconds, gradually fading to nearly invisible to the eye, then flaring up and brightly pulsing again, almost appearing larger in size during the pulses as the change in luminosity was so great, observed it over approximately 4 cycles before disappearing from view on constant southerly heading.  object traversed the visible arc of the celestial sphere over my head for a distance that i would define as probably 1/8th of the portion of the full arc of the visible sky, was completely out of sight in less than 60 seconds when it was no longer visible after it was just slightly beyond the apex of the sky, estimate velocity in the hypersonic range, 5,000 ��� 10,000 knots, suspect pulse detonation wave engine or other advanced propulsion system or possibly a rapidly rotating orbital body that was reflecting bright sunlight at regular pulsed intervals, however the velocity appeared to me to be easily 10x greater than previously observed high-altitude civilian aircraft and satellites of the evening.  the light emanating from the object did not to appear as distorted from atmosphere as previously-observed satellites, from that i draw the conclusion that it was lower in altitude than the satellites but at least double the altitude of the airliners i observed earlier which i had estimated to be in the neighborhood of fl 350.

the reason i am reporting it is due to the far greater velocity at which it traveled relative to other common nighttime objects and the brightness that, when at the apex of a pulse, was at least as bright as the clearly-visible planet to the east (bluish tinted planet, believe it to be venus or saturn).  it struck me as advanced terrestrial technology rather than advanced-civilization technology as it had no erratic movements, did not suddenly appear/disappear, did not hover, did not reflect multiple colors, but rather moved with the straight-line determination of an orbiting body or (an exceptionally high) high-altitude aircraft.  since it was on a n to s heading, also reason to suspect military program material, as such an orbit would transit the us and former ussr.



1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

back yard, rochester, monroe county, new york, usa.

2. what made you first notice the object?

stargazing and watching satellites and meteorites, bright flash caught my eye, followed the object to see that bright pulses were regularly spaced and faded over an approximately 2-second period from maximum brightness to base brightness, followed by approximately 6 seconds before the beginning of the next 2-second bright-to-dim phase.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

satellite, due to the high speed and star-like appearance, but exceptionally fast compared to satellites with brightness that was at least as great as comparable planetary bodies visible the same evening.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.

straight-line, no deviation.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

became keenly alert to this object as it clearly was something unusual - i have been a stargazer, aircraft-watcher, and satellite-watcher for some number of decades and have serious credentials in both military and civilian aviation including time at government entities that describe themselves with letters, as specific as i am willing to get on a public disclosure.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?

object made its last pulse/fade cycle slightly beyond the apex of the dome of the sky, would estimate that the closest recognizable constellations to the path of travel would have been lyra and cygnus, likely passing through a portion of cygnus.  no sound emanated from the object during the entire event, not unusual as it appeared to be very high altitude or orbital.
content.summary: Probable hypersonic aircraft sighting of terrestrial origin by individual with military and civilian aviation credentials

content.detailedDescription: Around 4:30 pm on 10/10/10 for three days in a row a yarn type material fell from the sky, but is only visible hanging off of objects when the sun is low in the sky. *(name deleted--cms/sg) will be arriving tomorrow to take samples and view this phenomenon.
content.summary: White yarn type of material falling from sky covering large area

content.detailedDescription:
Getting ready to go for an afternoon run.  looked up while stretching an immediately noticed the two objects.

at first i thought the larger object was a plane, but then i realized that i could see an elongated section, but no wings, no tail, no lights, no contrails, no doppler-shifted engine noise.

absolute clear daylight sky. very high up.  elongated cylindrical object moving steadily from nw to se.  smaller object moving randomly around the larger object: right to left, pause - hesitate, the circle left to right, pause - hesitate, then moved back to front as if examining the larger object.  smaller object continued this random movement for the duration that i could see the objects.

no lights.  no sounds.  no contrails.  far away but appeared to have metallic color.

smaller object was making "impossible" direction changes and pausing.

i wasn't frightened or alarmed.  just amazed that having spent years with my telescope looking at planets, nebulae, satellites, iridium flares, comets, etc..I finally see what i can only describe as a ufo in broad daylight.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small object circling randomly around larger, elongated, object

content.detailedDescription:
Happened to turn on the nasa channel. at home watching television. footage over earth at night, camera was panning across the surface until half of screen displayed space. sudden burst of tiny flashes of light in space (none over the surface area of earth) each burst was an extremely quick flash, a tight, precise sphere.

i think this is extremely important what happened next:

suddenly a video "noise" effect was activated. white bursts started appearing all over the screen including over the surface being shown of earth. the blips were big, misshapen and in no way similar to what i saw from the "official" footage moments before. i could still see the flashes in the sky from the real event going on, but for the most part they were obscured by the noise filter that had been activated suddenly.

the footage was dropped moments later as someone started discussing another unrelated topic.

what is important to me (besides the bright flashes above the earth) was that these people knew that this could happen and had a filter that could be activated (presumably) at the touch of a button to cover up what was happening.

i'm not a physics person, but the area covered by these lights had to be as large as the continental united states. assuming equal sized objects "flashing," these objects were three dimensional in layout (sizes varied of the flash, though all were perfect pinpoints of light.) not a single flash occurred near the surface of the earth along the rounded edge nor over any portion of the earth as seen from the camera's perspective.

the noise-creation filter activated by someone in authority was obvious and looked nothing like the real event. again, these speckles of white (not flashes of light) occurred over the entire image, far off in space (where none of the real flashes occurred) and included the entire surface where earth continents were visible.
content.summary: Live footage from nasa over earth. space above earth errupted in flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I have an apartment behind my parents home, and my boyfriend and i were just walking back to it from visiting with my mom.  he decided to stand outside to smoke, when i noticed what appeared to be mars in the night sky.  

i asked him, "matt, is that mars?"  at first he wasn't paying attention so i asked him again, "hey, is that mars?"  he agreed that it was.  i said, "wow! you can see it so clear tonight."  we haven't had any rain in several weeks and there wasn't a cloud in the sky that night.  needless to say, after observing it for a few more minutes, i turned my attention back towards him and was talking.  all of a sudden he says, "hey, find where mars went?"  

turning around sort of puzzled i did look in the exact spot where mars had appeared to be only a few seconds earlier, but it had dissapeared.  so i started to scan the sky and finally found it travelling in a north-east pass over us.  at the moment that the reddish-orange ball that i had thought only moments earlier to be the planet mars was parallel to our position, it shuts off the red-orange light and a series of three smaller bliking lights became visible. two white, one red and they appeared to rotate around the what now appeared to be triangular object in an irregular pattern.

the object was moving very quickly and silently and we watched as it sped off into the far distance, but before it completely dissapeared, i am almost positive that i observed it make a sharp dart downward, than back upward.  my boyfriend however had a hard time seeing it at this point and i think mostly because of the glare of our security light.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It looked like mars at first, until it started to move.

content.detailedDescription: This is actually something that my mother witnessed and this is the event as was told to me. she was on her way to work and saw the object hovering over route 50 above the ross county correctional institution. the object was long and cylindrical and was whitish silver in color. she couldn't tell if there was any rotation to the object, but could tell that the object appeared to look the same from all angles. she had to go to work, so she stopped watching the object. she said she knew immediately that she was looking at a ufo.
content.summary: White/silver cylinder, looked the same from all angles.

content.detailedDescription:
Flew to philadelphia on commercial flight. had window seat on left side of jet. we were descending westward toward the philadelphia airport and were just east of the delaware river when i noticed a close object, approx. 100-200 yards from the jet that looked like a metallic soccer ball. it was sort of sparkly as it flew and i thought that it was very odd. then i thought my eyes must be deceiving me and tried to think that maybe the sparkly look was due to a bird flapping it's wings... but would need to be too big to be a bird at even 100 yards. the pilots must have seen this thing... one could not miss it if they were looking out the window.

was watching a show today that mentioned mufon and did a search for soccer ball looking ufos were i read about a guy in ne arizona... his description sounds very similar to what i believe i saw. when i say that it looked like a soccer ball, it appeared to have flat spots in the same sort of configuration as a soccer ball. i could not tell whether it was going in the same direction as us but it appeared to be moving slow as we moved past it or it was going in the opposite direction. it was flying roughly in the same east west direction as us. the object was in my view for what seemed about 10-15 seconds.
content.summary: from jet at approx 6k ft saw a metallic soccer ball object flying near our jet

content.detailedDescription: Red glowing planet,moving in enormous circles giving the distance it might have been.Then moved left to right in straight lines. i awoke early made a.M. cofee and went outside for fresh air looked at all the stars before dawn would arrive. i was at home i thought it was aplanet because of red glow. it moved in wide circle motions then right an left,. in straight lines. amazed i was witnessing this ,it gave me a sense we are not alone ionly other alternative it' future military device but why?All i could say over and over agin is holy s--t etc.God forgive megoose bumbs examined other stars to get bearing no movement whatsoever, had to tell someone. lost sight due to sunrise.Call me *(name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Circular object moving in circular motion consistantly then straight line left & right

content.detailedDescription: Woke up early shortly before dawn went outside for some air looked up and stared at the stars, one cluster of stars had am red glow thinging it was a planet i kept staring in amusement, shortly thereafter the cluster started going in a circular motion, but first drifted to my left which would be west towards cape kennedy.Then it stopped and began to circle a fairly large motion no way to tell how,believing at first it was planet i have no knowledge of astronomy or mathamatical literacy. just a common joe. i then looked at otherstars believing i might have morning hallucinations. none of the other stars moved at all.The tight cluster kept circling,then went left in a straight line then right and circled again almost felt like it was playing with me again looked at other stars and no motion looked back at"planet"??? it kept circling till dawn then dissapeared in the light. had to let you know i never seen anything like this in my life of 63 years i truly believe this was not a hallucination of any sort it was too explicit in it's motion signed *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg)don't bother checking my records you'll believe i definately am unstable but trust me this happened good luck will look again tonight or in a.M. will let you know chow baby!!!!!
content.summary: 3tite nit balls w/red  glow
